name: Tyler Perry's The Oval
overview: A seemingly perfect interracial first family becomes the White House's newest residents. But behind closed doors they unleash a torrent of lies, cheating and corruption.

episodes.name: The Pilot
episodes.overview: Chaos ensues as the Franklin family prepares for the inauguration ball, Nancy's kind gesture backfires, Barry is caught off guard, and Lilly makes a risky choice.

episodes.name: Unforgettable
episodes.overview: An unspeakable tragedy strikes the family of The First Butler to the White House.

episodes.name: Heat
episodes.overview: Barry takes the law into his own hands as he seeks to be a hero for his family.

episodes.name: Rat's Can Smell Poison
episodes.overview: Richard's fatherly instincts kick in as he fights for his son's safety.

episodes.name: Allies
episodes.overview: Victoria seeks to put an end to Hunter's continued indiscretions.

episodes.name: Lab Rats
episodes.overview: Sharon makes a decision that could sabotage the two relationships most important to her.

episodes.name: The Dark Sheep
episodes.overview: Hunter's reckless behavior becomes uncontrollable.

episodes.name: Eye on the Sparrow
episodes.overview: Gayle finds out that her actions have consequences.

episodes.name: The Fish Bowl
episodes.overview: Lilly fears she has been set up by diabolical foes and needs a plan.

episodes.name: Going Black
episodes.overview: Victoria plays games of manipulation with White House staffers that make them choose alliances carefully

episodes.name: The United Front
episodes.overview: Victoria and Hunter try to calm concerns among the staff.

episodes.name: Hidden Secrets
episodes.overview: In the mid-season finale the First Lady gets an unexpected visitor and her husband gets an even nastier surprise.

episodes.name: Fear of God
episodes.overview: Chickens come home to roost for the president as past sins come back to haunt Hunter and Victoria.

episodes.name: One Time
episodes.overview: Barry makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Clock Work
episodes.overview: Kyle puts his boss in jeopardy by talking too much.

episodes.name: The Dangerous Game
episodes.overview: Nancy is angered by her son's actions, and the confrontation will change things forever.

episodes.name: Five Families
episodes.overview: Lilly finds herself being controlled in an unforeseen chain of events.

episodes.name: Me and You
episodes.overview: The first family attends their inauguration and moves into the White House, but a series of events threatens their security and livelihood.

episodes.name: Clueless
episodes.overview: A scare at the White House forces the president and first lady into the bunker.

episodes.name: Call of Duty
episodes.overview: Max and Yuma risk their lives and investigate suspicious activity in the White House residence.

episodes.name: The Godfather
episodes.overview: Kyle orchestrates a high-powered cover up.

episodes.name: The Loving Parents
episodes.overview: Hunter and Victoria must team up to solve a PR crisis that could jeopardize all they have built.

episodes.name: Unexpected Guest
episodes.overview: Nancy‚Äôs confession jeopardizes her marriage, Sharon and Barry have a change of heart, Victoria issues a warning to Gayle, and Hunter has a steamy encounter.

episodes.name: Twenty-Four Hours
episodes.overview: Secrets and lies abound as the president looks to fill the press secretary position.

episodes.name: One of Us
episodes.overview: Victoria‚Äôs mom vows to get Gayle and Jason in line, Barry makes a desperate decision, Sam is tested, and a revealing press conference has the White House doing damage control.

episodes.name: A Little Girl Talk
episodes.overview: Priscilla questions Sam, Jason and Gayle balk at their grandma's authority, Nancy sees Richard's dark side, Hunter gets troubling news, Barry's plan backfires, and Diane protects a witness.

episodes.name: Natural Habitat
episodes.overview: Jason carries out another fatal plan, Richard tries to piece together a timeline, Bobby sets out to protect Max, Nancy turns to Priscilla for help, and Victoria makes a gruesome discovery.

episodes.name: Wicked Things
episodes.overview: Victoria and Hunter begin to connect the dots, Sharon bails out Barry, Sam delivers tragic news, Diane meets up with Bobby and Lilly, and Priscilla tries to pinpoint Jean's whereabouts.

episodes.name: The Fencer
episodes.overview: Denise, Bobby, Lilly and Max discuss a plan of action, Sam is concerned about Priscilla's behavior, Nancy has a realization about the mystery money, and Hunter and Victoria confront Jason.

episodes.name: A Stranger At Home
episodes.overview: Jason reveals the truth about what happened on the flight, Richard escalates a workplace flirtation, and a new pharmacy employee has information that could help Barry find Callie.

episodes.name: Malicious Intent
episodes.overview: Priscilla grows increasingly suspicious about Jean's disappearance, Sam receives an unexpected offer, Nancy discovers a secret, and Kyle is apprehensive about Lilly's return.

episodes.name: Hidden Secrets
episodes.overview: The President and First Lady team up to deal with their son's behavior. Barry and Sharon's relationship continues to crumble. Donald and Lilly's love triangle takes a turn.

episodes.name: Dont Believe Your Eyes
episodes.overview: Kyle informs Lilly that he‚Äôs willing to do anything to show his love for Donald. Ironically, Bobby is outside willing to put his life on the line for Lilly. Jason takes a stand against his mother.

episodes.name: Political Junkie
episodes.overview: Priscilla pays Ms. Laura a visit in an attempt to get answers about a high crime cover up. Jason befriends Allan with an ulterior motive. Donald and Lilly come to a mutual understanding about their marriage.

episodes.name: The Master
episodes.overview: Bobby preaches patience to Max, Dale tends to Kyle, Victoria makes her intentions known to Sam, Barry contacts the Rakudushis, and Jason lets Allan in on a secret.

episodes.name: Empty Your Bag
episodes.overview: After Allan catches Ellie with Hunter, Jason suggests a way for him to get even, Dikahn tells Barry how he can get his daughter back, and Donald sends Kyle on a mission to tie up loose ends.

episodes.name: Misunderstood
episodes.overview: A looming news investigation threatens Hunter's presidency, Diane attends a meeting at the White House, Richard makes an accusation, and Sam's willpower is tested.

episodes.name: Every Weekend
episodes.overview: Sam distances himself from Victoria after their tryst, Kyle goes to extremes to get information from Diane, Nancy reveals the identity of Picky's father, and Barry meets with Ruth.

episodes.name: The Target
episodes.overview: Barry is desperate to find his daughter. Hunter and Victoria share a power struggle concerning a terrorist. Lilly lays down a few ground rules for Donald as they discuss the terms of their marriage.

episodes.name: Don't Move
episodes.overview: Barry finds himself in a life-threatening situation. Victoria works to ruin Sam's life. Priscilla continues to dig about a crime that may havehappened in The White House.

episodes.name: Familiar Faces
episodes.overview: Victoria and Priscilla lay their cards on the table, Max calls on an old friend for help, Hunter takes a risk in order to impress Ellie, and Sharon and Dale visit Richard at the White House.

episodes.name: Body Parts
episodes.overview: Hunter goes on a power trip; Richard and Sharon put their lives on the line to rescuer Barry

episodes.name: Misunderstood
episodes.overview: Sharon is rushed to the hospital, Victoria's dad requests a meeting with her and Hunter, Lilly learns the truth about Bobby, Sam faces down Kyle, and Priscilla confides in a trusted friend.

episodes.name: Nine Lives
episodes.overview: Nancy and Richard try to figure out what happened to Barry, Sharon receives devastating news, Jason secretly follows a White House employee home, and Lilly confronts Bobby about the photos.

episodes.name: The Skies Have Eyes
episodes.overview: Jason is on the prowl; Ruth fights against Barry regarding custody of Callie; Ellie finds herself in danger

episodes.name: Powerful Hands
episodes.overview: Bobby and Max plot to bring the president to a catastrophic demise; Barry learns that Sharon has suffered a tragic loss

episodes.name: Doomsday
episodes.overview: Pricilla finally stands up to Victoria, giving her a dose of reality; Lilly stands up for herself before she comes a victim of the first family; Barry enacts a sinister plan.

episodes.name: An Eye For An Eye
episodes.overview: The President and First lady barely dodge death but continue in their ways. Hunter vows for revenge, Victoria has lustful eyes on Sam, and Jason is ready to finish the job someone else started of taking his mother out.

episodes.name: Off-Limits
episodes.overview: Bobby, Max and Blakely attempt to access the White House computer system, Hunter demands Ellie ignore her official duties, and Victoria tries to coerce Allan into an act of violence.

episodes.name: The Mole
episodes.overview: Priscilla calls on a powerful, secret ally when Victoria attempts to fire her, Blakely grows increasingly paranoid, Jason feels betrayed by Allan, and Barry reaches out to Sharon.

episodes.name: In Need Of Protection
episodes.overview: Victoria follows through on her threat to Allan, Sam suspects Priscilla is in the intelligence community, Dale is wary when Kyle pays him a visit, and Donald resist the president's orders.

episodes.name: Behind Closed Doors
episodes.overview: Bobby devises a plan to rescue Max, Kyle is assigned to watch over Jason, Ellie ends things with Hunter, Donald visits Dale in the hospital, and Hunter invites Sharon to the White House.

episodes.name: A Family Matter
episodes.overview: Victoria and Hunter respond to a family emergency, Dale fears for his life, Richard and Barry confide in Sam, Alonzo bears a difficult assignment, and Kyle goes on a mission for Hunter.

episodes.name: Ho Patrol
episodes.overview: Sharon tries to escape from Kyle, Bobby searches the White House for Max, Lilly accidentally raises her husband's suspicions, and Jason finally pushes Alonzo past his breaking point.

episodes.name: One Rule
episodes.overview: The President makes Sharon a salacious offer, Donald discovers a major security breach, and Bobby and Max discover a powerful new ally.

episodes.name: Glove Up
episodes.overview: Allan balks at Victoria's demands, Sharon goes to Richard for help, Barry gets a shock, the vice president reveals his plan to Max and Bobby, and Donald and Kyle press Lilly for answers.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.overview: Kyle takes extreme measures to get information from Lilly, Allan has suspicions about Ellie's death, Jason makes a troubling confession, and the vice president demands a meeting with Hunter.

episodes.name: The Children
episodes.overview: The vice president reveals his cards to Victoria and Hunter, causing them to team up and try to combat his attack.

episodes.name: The Dutiful Wife
episodes.overview: A press briefing called by the vice president places Hunter and Victoria in the hot seat behind recent tragedies that transpired.

episodes.name: Tragic Monologues
episodes.overview: Eli causes chaos to erupt in the White House when he exposes Hunter's criminal activity to the press, and Victoria decides to use it to her advantage

episodes.name: The Command Performance
episodes.overview: Victoria rubs everyone close to her the wrong way as she elects to change the narrative on her own following a tragic accident

episodes.name: Wicked
episodes.overview: Kareem learns the hard way that everyone is trustworthy when he seeks help to stop Kyle and keep him away from Sharon.

episodes.name: The Hornet's Nest
episodes.overview: Hunter plans to demonstrate his power to Kareem after discovering his ability to move undetected Lilly swears off playing the victim and turns the tables on Donald.

episodes.name: Get a Grip
episodes.overview: Hunter promotes Grip after he provides him with another devious tool; Hunter presents Sharon with a proposition that she isn't interested in taking, but he's not giving up.

episodes.name: Next to Impossible
episodes.overview: When Kyle goes missing in action, the race begins to find him, as he holds many secrets of the first family; Hunter and Victoria worry about where Kyle's loyalties truly lie.

episodes.name: Gathering Evidence
episodes.overview: Tensions and paranoia arise in D.C., as some unsettling truths are revealed about the President.

episodes.name: The Vendetta
episodes.overview: Victoria goes to Donald with concerns about what consequences could be for all of them once Jason comes home.

episodes.name: Ugly Politics
episodes.overview: Victoria gets the last laugh with Jason in the hospital, while the Vice President tries to gain new allies to stay alive.

episodes.name: The Package
episodes.overview: Priscilla and Grip face off, President Franklin seeks to indulge his vices, Jason's autopsy yields a stunning revelation, and Sam asks Richard to attend an important rendezvous.

episodes.name: Black Stallion
episodes.overview: Jason quickly discovers that he is part of a larger scheme; Bobby is used as a pawn in the conflict between Sharon and Donald; while Alonzo plans a covert rendezvous with the presPriscilla, Kareem, Allan and Dale grow tired of waiting for Richard, the president hires a sex worker, Jason tries to figure out what's happening to him, and Donald uses Lilly to lure Bobby.ident and a woman; they learn that she is not who she claims to be.

episodes.name: Into the Woods
episodes.overview: Alonzo helps Hunter out of a jam, Max and Bobby devise a plan to rescue Lilly, Richard searches for Barry, Sam senses danger at the hospital, and Dale, Allan and Kareem go off-grid.

episodes.name: Wicked
episodes.overview: Richard springs Sam from the hospital as they attempt to do damage control; Jason attempts to put a plan into motion, but Davis shuts it down before it begins.

episodes.name: Imagine, Power and Money
episodes.overview: Hunter discovers that Jason‚Äôs part of a wider scheme in which Victoria may have played a role; Victoria and Eli look to be succeeding in their plan to mislead everyone with classified information, but Simone becomes suspicious.

episodes.name: Guns Blazing
episodes.overview: After Allan and Dale's whereabouts are compromised due to an irresponsible decision from Allan, they must be quick to formulate another plan; Sam has questions for Jason that could put Hunter in a world of trouble

episodes.name: Hook, Line and Sinker
episodes.overview: Jason balmes his parents for his secrets, but realizes they're also the reason he's in grave danger. Victoria and Donald's deceptive plan appears to be working, while Bobby and Max devise a cunning scheme to spy on the President

episodes.name: It's Over
episodes.overview: Bobby and Max attempt to recruit Sharon for undercover duties; Allan catches Kyle off guard.

episodes.name: Out of Line
episodes.overview: David questions Jason about his suicide attempt; Kareem questions Sharon's loyalty.

episodes.name: Truth Be Told
episodes.overview: Hunter and Victoria prepare to with with the Vice President; Nancy puts her life in jeopardy.

episodes.name: What‚Äôs Done in the Dark
episodes.overview: After willingly going to the compound, Nancy is put in a troubling situation.

episodes.name: The Stories We Tell
episodes.overview: Kareem tries to figure out what happened in his apartment, Victoria grows suspicious of Donald, Simone enlists the help of Bobby, and Priscilla catches Sam in a compromising situation.

episodes.name: Back Off
episodes.overview: Sam calls Victoria out when she decides to interfere with his already rocky marriage with Priscilla; Jason goes into survivor mode and finds solace in an unlikely ally while on the run.

episodes.name: Know Your Place
episodes.overview: Officer Heller is determined to learn the truth about what is happening with Lilly; after returning home, Richard makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Deception
episodes.overview: Max warns Bobby he‚Äôs playing with fire the more involved he finds himself in Priscilla‚Äôs game; Hunter overhears Victoria having what he believes is a compromising conversation and demands answers from Victoria.

episodes.name: Problem Diverted
episodes.overview: While Kareem and his cousin Norman bury his difficulties, Richard is forced to reconcile Nancy's unexpected madness; Hunter and Victoria discover the truth about Jason just as his life is about to implode.

episodes.name: Bridge Over Troubled Water
episodes.overview: When Jason and Alonzo's cover is blown, they must go to extreme measures to escape; Agent kane is tested against a well-trained adversary.

episodes.name: No Regrets
episodes.overview: Simone tries to warn Eli about the First Lady‚Äôs mischievous  intent, but Eli rebuts her attempt; Hunter threatens Alonzo to carry out his orders exactly as he‚Äôs requested or face dire consequences.

episodes.name: It‚Äôs No Secret
episodes.overview: Sharon discovers Kareem‚Äôs dark secret and fears for her life; Victoria and Donald are worried, as they think the Federal Bureau is after them; Dale is caught in the middle of an illegal transaction.

episodes.name: The Point of No Return
episodes.overview: Alonzo questions Dale about the drugs that are being stashed at the pharmacy; Kyle makes a new discovery about David, putting everyone on high alert.

episodes.name: Pins and Needles
episodes.overview: Following a terrible accident, Sharon finds herself in the hands of the law; after Nancy‚Äôs delirium, Richard finds her in a horrible situation.

episodes.name: The Last Strike
episodes.overview: In the midst of a dramatic situation, Richard is presented with information that turns his word upside down; Jason and David have their backs against the wall, with a slim chance of escaping.

episodes.name: Turning Tables
episodes.overview: The White House goes into panic mode after the president overdoses, Jason finds himself in a dangerous place, and Sam grapples with his jealousy over Priscilla and Bobby.

episodes.name: The Missing Link
episodes.overview: Sam and Max believe Jason is the missing link in exposing Victoria; they continue to search high and low for his whereabouts; Eli is sworn in as President, creating a whirlwind of drama

episodes.name: Man Down
episodes.overview: Eli's immediate abuse of power affects everyone in the district; Simone and Victoria remain at odds, and Simone receives news she finds hard to believe.

episodes.name: Coming Clean
episodes.overview: Priscilla takes extreme measures to make it clear to Sam that she is done with him; Nancy shares a truth about her past with Richard that he isn't prepared to hear.

episodes.name: Something To Hide
episodes.overview: While Jason realizes he can no longer hide, Hunter finds Victoria in a compromising position; Dale assists Allan as he realizes he may be a part of a bigger scheme.

episodes.name: Gone In A Second
episodes.overview: With tension at an all-time high inside the White House, Hunter must orchestrate a plan to regain his power; Jason formulates a way to escape the compound.

episodes.name: Exit Wound
episodes.overview: Hunter makes accusations about fidelity that could turn the district upside down; Kareem is taken from the hospital against his will to face Hunter once and for all.

episodes.name: Sorry Not Sorry
episodes.overview: Simone decides to humble herself before Victoria for the greater good; Allan must choose which side to stand with when he's approached by the FBI.

episodes.name: Better than Revenge
episodes.overview: Hunter is on a rampage, and Sam and Max are willing to go to any limit to destroy the First Family; Jason, who is closer than they think, devises his own plan of vengeance.

episodes.name: Sound of Silence
episodes.overview: Sam‚Äôs loyalty is questioned when he‚Äôs caught in an unexplainable situation. With Jason back in the picture, Victoria is nervous the truth will surface.

episodes.name: Recovery
episodes.overview: Hunter demands answers and seeks all out retribution and vengeance for what was done to him. Kareem and Antonio must determine how to get out of their sticky situation in order to avoid Hunter‚Äôs wrath.

episodes.name: Who's Playing Who
episodes.overview: When Hunter's eyes are opened to the truth, he goes into self-preservation mode and begins to weed out those who can't be trusted. Richard gives Nancy no choice but to face her wrongdoings.

episodes.name: A Snake In The Grass
episodes.overview: Hunter is ready to go to any length to regain his power, meanwhile tension inside the White House it at an all-time high. With his back against the wall, Jason must decide who he can trust and who he can't.

episodes.name: Off the Deep End
episodes.overview: Hunter has Victoria right where he wants her as Kal and Bobby come head-to-head over the key to the first family's demise; Bobby holds major evidence to Victoria's downfall.

episodes.name: Dark Secrets
episodes.overview: Jason exercises a power play involving Nancy; Hunter makes plans to shake things up in the district.

episodes.name: Bed of Lies
episodes.overview: As secrets begin to spill out around the White House, Priscilla must pick a side; Simone formulates an evil plan to get back at Eli.

episodes.name: No Regrets
episodes.overview: Sam prepares for an interview that will reveal the First Families‚Äô misdeeds; Donald must show his devotion to Hunter; Victoria finds herself in a life-threatening situation.

episodes.name: Adjust and Adapt
episodes.overview: Donald springs into  action when his best ally, Victoria, finds herself helpless; thanks to his secret eye, Hunter uses his power to move against Victoria and Donald.

episodes.name: Breaking News
episodes.overview: Hunter and Victoria face off; Hunter professes a revelation about Jason; Sam presents Lena with a career-changing opportunity to break some news.

episodes.name: Keep Your Enemies Close
episodes.overview: Jason breaks his silence pertaining to his parents; Priscilla proves her loyalty to Hunter after catching Kyle in a questionable scenario.

episodes.name: Losing It
episodes.overview: Eli searches desperately in the hopes of uncovering Victoria's whereabouts. All hell is breaking loose at the White House while the lost are being found.
